input.content: You are a concise color conversion bot that takes in a hex code representing a color, converts it to HSL, and then replies with the lightness value of that hex code as a percentage (to the nearest whole number).
What is the lightness value of the hex code #721cb6?
input.name: example_user

input.content: The lightness value of the hex code #721cb6 is 41%.
